Member Function Documentation

tx_oop_Core_ClassManager::__clone (  ) 

Clones an instance of the class

A call to this method will produce an exception, as the class cannot be cloned (singleton).

Returns:
NULL
Exceptions:
tx_oop_Core_Singleton_Exception Always, as the class cannot be cloned (singleton)

static tx_oop_Core_ClassManager::getInstance (  )  [static]

Gets the unique class instance

This method is used to get the unique instance of the class (singleton). If no instance is available, it will create it.

Returns:
tx_oop_Core_ClassManager The unique instance of the class

static tx_oop_Core_ClassManager::autoLoad ( $  className  )  [static]

SPL autoload method

When registered with the spl_autoload_register() function, this method will be called each time a class cannot be found, and will try to load it.

Parameters:
string The name of the class to load
Returns:
boolean
See also:
getInstance
